Record.Property: SELECT C.cAdditionalEmail, C.cECSREmailNotification, C.nCustomers_id, C.mMaxOrderAmount, C.lCanViewInventory, C.UseOrderMultipleUOM, C.cPreviewInvoiceDistribution, C.cInvoiceDistributedMethod, C.cLineItemCodeLabel, C.cWebmethodsCustomerid, BBR.RequireCustomerLinePO, BBR.RequireCustomerLineField1, BBR.RequireCustomerLineField2, BBR.CustomerLineField1Title, BBR.CustomerLineField2Title, BBR.SendPOAcknowledgement, BBR.AcceptPriceOverride, BBR.PreventAutoOrderPlacement, BBR.HeaderCommentsSentByCust, BBR.DoNotAllowDuplicatePos, BBR.NonStandardShipMethod, BBR.CustomerSelectedShipComplete, BBR.ValidateShipToZipCode, BBR.ShipDateSentNotNextBusinessDay, BBR.LineCommentsSentByCust, BBR.MatchLineDeliveryDates, BBR.PreventBackorders, BBR.ItemsNotAvailForNextDayShip, C.lCanOrder, C.lCanViewPrices, C.lUseCustomerSKU, B.BrandName, C.mMinOrderAmount, C.cBranchCode, ls.cName, C.cCompanyCode, CAST(C.cLocalCustomerNumber as numeric) as cLocalCustomerNumber FROM xpedx.dbo.customers C (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedx.dbo.wm_CustomerCrossReference ccr (NOLOCK)on c.ncustomers_id = substring(ccr.xpedxcustomerid,2,len(ccr.xpedxcustomerid)-1) LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedx.dbo.bo_businessRules BBR (NOLOCK) ON C.nMasterCustomers_id = BBR.nMasterCustomers_id --C.nCustomers_id = BBR.nCustomers_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedx.dbo.CustomerDivisions CD (NOLOCK) ON C.nCustomers_Id = CD.nCustomers_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedx.dbo.Divisions D (NOLOCK) ON CD.nDivisions_Id = D.nDivisions_ID INNER JOIN xpedx.dbo.LegacySystems ls (NOLOCK) ON D.nLegacySystems_id = ls.nLegacySystems_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedx.dbo.Brands B (NOLOCK) ON D.Brands_Id = B.Brands_Id WHERE C.lDeleted = 0 and ls.cName = 'MAX' and C.cLocalCustomerNumber not in ('CL','00X8412447','3051284-00') and C.cNG_datamigration_Flag <> 'M' and ('#Extract_Type#' = 'F' OR ('#Extract_Type#' = 'C' and c.ncustomers_id in (select nCustomers_id from xpedx.dbo.CustomerXref_NextGen)) )

SELECT C.cAdditionalEmail, C.cECSREmailNotification, C.nCustomers_id, C.mMaxOrderAmount, C.lCanViewInventory, C.UseOrderMultipleUOM, C.cPreviewInvoiceDistribution, C.cInvoiceDistributedMethod, C.cLineItemCodeLabel, C.cWebmethodsCustomerid, BBR.RequireCustomerLinePO, BBR.RequireCustomerLineField1, BBR.RequireCustomerLineField2, BBR.CustomerLineField1Title, BBR.CustomerLineField2Title, BBR.SendPOAcknowledgement, BBR.AcceptPriceOverride, BBR.PreventAutoOrderPlacement, BBR.HeaderCommentsSentByCust, BBR.DoNotAllowDuplicatePos, BBR.NonStandardShipMethod, BBR.CustomerSelectedShipComplete, BBR.ValidateShipToZipCode, BBR.ShipDateSentNotNextBusinessDay, BBR.LineCommentsSentByCust, BBR.MatchLineDeliveryDates, BBR.PreventBackorders, BBR.ItemsNotAvailForNextDayShip, C.lCanOrder, C.lCanViewPrices, C.lUseCustomerSKU, B.BrandName, C.mMinOrderAmount, C.cBranchCode, ls.cName, C.cCompanyCode, CAST(C.cLocalCustomerNumber as numeric) as cLocalCustomerNumber FROM xpedxr1.dbo.customers C (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.wm_CustomerCrossReference ccr (NOLOCK)on c.ncustomers_id = substring(ccr.xpedxcustomerid,2,len(ccr.xpedxcustomerid)-1) LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.bo_businessRules BBR (NOLOCK) ON C.nMasterCustomers_id = BBR.nMasterCustomers_id --C.nCustomers_id = BBR.nCustomers_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.CustomerDivisions CD (NOLOCK) ON C.nCustomers_Id = CD.nCustomers_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.Divisions D (NOLOCK) ON CD.nDivisions_Id = D.nDivisions_ID INNER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.LegacySystems ls (NOLOCK) ON D.nLegacySystems_id = ls.nLegacySystems_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xpedxr1.dbo.Brands B (NOLOCK) ON D.Brands_Id = B.Brands_Id WHERE C.lDeleted = 0 and ls.cName = 'MAX' and C.cLocalCustomerNumber not in ('CL','00X8412447','3051284-00') and C.cNG_datamigration_Flag <> 'M'
